00035 
00036 namespace Spark
00037 {
00038 
00039 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #if WCHAR_STRINGS
00042     typedef std::wstring SpStringBase;
00043 #else
00044     typedef std::string SpStringBase;
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 class SpString;
00048 typedef std::stringstream SpStringStreamType;
00049 typedef std::vector<SpString> SpStringArray;
00050 typedef std::list<SpString> SpStringList;
00051 typedef std::pair<SpString, SpString> SpStringPair;
00052 
00053 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 class SpString : public SpStringBase
00057 {
00058 
00060 public:
00061 
00062     typedef size_type SizeType;
00063 
00065 public:
00066 
00067     SpString();
00068     SpString(const SpString& rkStr);
00069     SpString(const string& rkStr);
00070     SpString(const char* acStr);
00071     SpString(const char* acStr, SizeType kLength);
00072     SpString(const SpString& rkStr, SizeType kStart, SizeType kEnd);
00073     SpString(SizeType kLength, char c);
00074 
00076 public:
00077 
00078     inline SpString& operator=(const SpString& rkStr);
00079     inline SpString& operator=(const std::string& rkStr);
00080     inline SpString& operator=(const char *acStr);
00081     inline SpString& operator=(char c);
00082 
00083     // append data from various sources
00084     inline SpString& operator+=(const SpString& rkStr);
00085     inline SpString& operator+=(const std::string& rkStr);
00086     inline SpString& operator+=(const char *acStr);
00087     inline SpString& operator+=(char c);
00088 
00089     // append data from various sources
00090     inline SpString& operator+(const SpString& rkStr);
00091     inline SpString& operator+(const std::string& rkStr);
00092     inline SpString& operator+(const char *acStr);
00093     inline SpString& operator+(char c);
00094 
00095     // test equality and inequality (case sensitive)
00096     //inline bool operator==(const SpString& rkStr);
00097     //inline bool operator!=(const SpString& rkStr);
00098 
00100 public:
00101 
00102     // clear method (for older stdlibs that don't have it)
00103     void clear();
00104 
00105     // template operator for appending another type into the string.
00106     template<class Class> SpString& add(const Class &rtValue);
00107 
00108     // c-string support
00109     inline operator const char* () const;
00110 
00111     // operator that allows SpString to be used as an STL map key value
00112     inline bool operator<(const SpString& rkStr);
00113 
00114     // special strings
00115     static const SpString EMPTY;
00116 
00117 };
